summary: An ordinance of the City of Seattle, granting to Pacific Coast and Steel Company, a corporation, and Seattle Steel Company, a corporation, their successors and assigns, the right, privilege and authority to locate, lay down, construct, maintain and operate, in perpetuity, certain switching and service tracks, in, along and upon and across certain designated streets within the limits of said City and granting to said corporation rights of way for such tracks in, along, upon and across such streets and avenues of said city.
